name: Penguin Horror
text:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can declare 1 card name and banish 2 "Penguin" cards from your GY; for the rest of this turn, neither player can activate cards or the effects of cards with that name, also you cannot Special Summon monsters except "Penguin" monsters. If this card is sent to the GY for the Summon of a "Penguin" monster; return 1 card your opponent controls to the hand. You can only use each effect of "Penguin Horror" once per turn.
